content: Colorado Gov. Signs Partner Benefits Bill Colorado governor Bill Ritter discreetly signed a bill earlier this week that would give same-sex domestic partners of state employees the same benefits as spouses of heterosexual employees. "It's an important piece of legislation that will help make sure the state can attract and retain good employees and compete with the private sector," said Rep. Mark Ferrandino, one of the bill’s sponsors. >>>http://www.advocate.com/news_detail_ektid85165.asp

title: Colorado Gov. Signs Partner Benefits Bill
